entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: E 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
